story.storykicker: The Oil and Natural Gas Corporation of India, has released an official notification inviting all the interested, eligible candidates to apply for the post of General Duty Medical Officer.
story.storybody:
The Oil and Natural Gas Corporation of India, has released an official notification inviting all the interested, eligible candidates to apply for the post of General Duty Medical Officer.

All the candidates need to apply need to walk -in for the interview on June 8.

Vacancy details:

Total posts: 10

Name of the post:

General Duty Medical Officer

Eligibility criteria:

Educational qualification:

All the candidates interested in applying for this post must possess a degree in Bachelor of Medicine, Bachelor of Surgery (MBBS) degree from recognised university/ institute with registration certificate from State/Medical council of India.

For more details on eligibility criteria, all the candidates need to check the official notification available on the university's website.

Age limit:

The candidates need to check the official notification.

How to apply:

  • All the candidates need to download the application form for interview from the website, www.ongcindia.com
  • The candidates need to fill in all the details in the prescribed format only
  • Along with application form, the candidate needs to get documents related to educational and experience certificates
  • The interview will be held at NGC Chatral Guest House (Transit Accommodation), Chandkheda, Ahmadabad'

Important dates:

The walk-in interview will be held on June 8 at 9.30 am.

About ONGC:

The Oil and Natural Gas Corporation Limited (ONGC) is an Indian multinational oil and gas company headquartered in Dehradun, Uttarakhand, India. It is a Public Sector Undertaking (PSU) of the government of India, under the administrative control of the Ministry of Petroleum and Natural Gas. It is India's largest oil and gas exploration and production company.

 

Read: Intel competition in US awards six Indian students

For exam related news click here.
